entry.summary: We've just opened up ~ 40 more spots for our @CoinbaseCloud X D_D @vibesIRL party tonight 👀 Two free party busses 🚌 to the venue, pickups at 6pm and ~ 6:30pm from: 1️⃣ Agora Conference Center 2️⃣ Grand Hyatt Hotel First come, first serve 🫡 RSVP https://lu.ma/D_D-Bog

entry.title: RT Web3Dubai Conf: Re Here's how to get a free ticket: - follow @developer_dao and @Web3Dubai - like and RT the above tweet - reply with your address ...
entry.summary: RT Web3Dubai Conf Re Here's how to get a free ticket: - follow @developer_dao and @Web3Dubai - like and RT the above tweet - reply with your address and D_D number - mention a friend in your reply We'll select 10 people in 48 hours ⏰ See you at the conference 🔥 https://web3dubai.org/

entry.title: RT Chase Chapman: 2 huge barriers to crypto adoption: 1) crypto people act like assholes in bull markets 2) the tech is complicated "have fun staying ...
entry.summary: RT Chase Chapman 2 huge barriers to crypto adoption: 1) crypto people act like assholes in bull markets 2) the tech is complicated "have fun staying poor" doesn't exactly motivate people to explore the space if we fixed #1, people would probs be a lot more willing to learn
